methods.name: GetParameter
methods.description: Set Sensor Name Request.  Note that the Sensor Name is part of the BLE advertisement.

items.name: r1
items.description:
0 = success
1 = read only
2 = out of range
3 = other error

methods.name: Echo
methods.description: Set Sensor Name Request.  Note that the Sensor Name is part of the BLE advertisement.

1 = Switch to Battery
